name: Operation DogFight
storyline: Take to the skies in a world of conflict between humankind's best friends in Operation DogFight! Fetch up to three of your bestest friends to compete and see who the top-dog is in frantic local multiplayer action. Operation DogFight is best played with controllers, but can support up to one person on Keyboard/Mouse.
summary: Take to the skies in a world of conflict between humankind's best friends and the evil cat empire! Experience over-the-top flight combat in a thrilling Story Mode that’ll leave your tail wagging, or fetch up to three of your bestest friends and compete to find the top-dog in local multiplayer.
